content: this darling pentagon-shaped pocket featuring a whimsical bow closure is the perfect accessory for keeping your earbuds measuring tape lip balm and other tiny treasures safely nestled by your side hang it from your purse or project bag for instant charm and convenience pattern details -pattern is written in us terms -worsted/medium weight yarn and 4 mm crochet hook -includes gauge and measurements -digital download will be received through email after purchase -no returns on digital items -i do allow sales of finished pieces made from my patterns **please note this pattern is available for free on the woodland stitchcraft blog here ---> https //woodlandstitchcraft com/earbud-pocket/ i am offering this for a small fee in a printable ad-free pdf version but the pattern is available in its entirety on the blog youtube tutorial ---> https //youtu be/5ddth75a3-o sign up for the woodland stitchcraft newsletter here https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n5r2d2
